items.title: Carrick favourite for Man Utd caretaker role
items.summary: Michael Carrick emerges as favourite for the Manchester United caretaker role with club chiefs hoping to have an appointment in place for when players return to training on Wednesday.

items.title: Nieuwe impulsen en oude gebreken bij AZ
items.summary: Stevige teambesprekingen, wijzigingen in de staf en het debuut van Jizz Hornkamp en Ayoub Oufkir sorteerden weinig effect bij AZ. Tegen FC Volendam werd de slechte competitiereeks doorbroken, maar het veldspel was nog steeds pover.

items.title: Nieuw dieptepunt voor Man Utd: minste wedstrijden sinds start Eerste Wereldoorlog
items.summary: Manchester United verkeert al jaren in een mega-crisis, maar heeft dit seizoen misschien wel het dieptepunt bereikt. Op plaatsing voor Europees voetbal via de competitie na, hebben The Red Devils in januari al werkelijk niks meer om voor te spelen. Het seizoen met het minste aantal wedstrijden sinds de start van de Eerste Wereldoorlog is een feit.

items.title: Daan Rots dankzij familiegoal opnieuw van waarde voor FC Twente
items.summary: Daan Rots zorgde er zaterdagavond voor dat FC Twente na het missen van een hele reeks kansen in ieder geval nog een punt overhield aan het thuisduel met PEC Zwolle. De linksbenige aanvaller kopte in de slotfase raak uit een voorzet van zijn jongere broer Mats. Voor Daan was het zijn vierde goal in de laatste zes competitieduels. Ook was de 24-jarige vleugelspits nog goed voor een assist.

items.title: Zo liep Pepi zijn blessure op: moet PSV in januari de markt op?
items.summary: Ricardo Pepi brak zaterdagavond op onfortuinlijke manier zijn onderarm bij het maken van een doelpunt tegen Excelsior. PSV gaat mogelijk de winterse transfermarkt op om het wegvallen van de Amerikaanse spits op te vangen. Pepi staat naar verwachting zo'n twee maanden aan de kant, terwijl met Myron Boadu en Alassane Pl√©a de twee andere spitsen in de selectie al geblesseerd waren.

items.title: Bekijk hier alle samenvattingen van 18de speelronde Eredivisie
items.summary: De Eredivisie ging afgelopen weekend weer van start met de achttiende speelronde. Bekijk hieronder alle samenvattingen van de eerste competitieduels van 2026. De wedstrijd tussen NEC en FC Utrecht ging vrijdag niet door wegens winterse omstandigheden.

items.title: FA Cup third round: 10 talking points from the weekend‚Äôs football
items.summary: Crystal Palace‚Äôs stars wilt, Manchester City‚Äôs youngsters shine, and Liam Rosenior starts in stylish fashion Playing against lower-league opposition as a top-flight side in the FA Cup is like batting on the first morning of a Test match ‚Äì you cannot really win and failure can prompt humiliation and reputational damage. To that end, some members of the Crystal Palace side deservedly beaten by Macclesfield perhaps learned a valuable lesson at Moss Rose. Marc Gu√©hi and Adam Wharton are linked regularly with big moves away from Palace, but part of succeeding at elite clubs ‚Äì the pair are admired by Manchester City and Manchester United respectively ‚Äì is coping with being overwhelming favourites. Oliver Glasner, too, may have designs on bigger things, with United again a possible destination, but to see his side schooled by part-timers was a blow to his burgeoning reputation. Glasner slammed his players after the defeat but the Austrian must take a portion of the blame. They must all do better. Dominic Booth Report: Macclesfield 2-1 Crystal Palace Report: Manchester City 10-1 Exeter Report: Manchester United 1-2 Brighton Report: Derby 1-3 Leeds Continue reading...

items.title: Sources: Carrick has backing for Man United job
items.summary: Michael Carrick has growing support within Manchester United for the role of interim manager, with sources telling ESPN that the former midfielder has significant backing.

items.title: Raphinha's 'intensity' leads Bar√ßa Supercopa win
items.summary: Barcelona manager Hansi Flick lauded Raphinha's mentality after the Brazilian haunted Real Madrid once again with two goals in his team's 3-2 Spanish Supercopa final win in Saudi Arabia on Sunday.

items.title: Martinelli hat-trick as Arsenal beat Portsmouth
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli scored a hat-trick as Arsenal overcame an early scare to thrash Championship strugglers Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Liverpool's Bradley out for season with knee injury
items.summary: Liverpool defender Conor Bradley is set to miss the rest of the season after suffering a serious knee injury in Thursday's 0-0 draw with Arsenal.

items.title: Evans knocked out of Australian Open qualifying as Norrie wins in Auckland
items.summary: Former British No 1 Dan Evans is out of Australian Open qualifying following a first-round defeat to Japan's Rei Sakamoto.

items.title: Nunc Est Bibendum chases hat-trick on Lingfield Monday card
items.summary: It's a busy Monday on Sky Sports Racing, with Lingfield and Hereford hosting action before evening racing on Wolverhampton's all-weather.

items.title: Are fans being turned off multi-club ownership model?
items.summary: Strasbourg fans thought they had it good from being aligned with Chelsea. Then manager Liam Rosenior walked out mid-season to take charge of the Blues.

items.title: 'I'll get goosebumps' - Barnsley duo out to upset old club Liverpool
items.summary: For Adam Phillips and Vimal Yoganathan, it could be the fulfilment of a lifelong dream when Barnsley take on Liverpool at Anfield on Monday.

items.title: Maye leads Patriots past Chargers to claim first playoff win
items.summary: Drake Maye threw a touchdown pass to Hunter Henry in the fourth quarter as the New England Patriots defense roughed up Justin Herbert in a 16-3 AFC Wild Card playoff victory over the Los Angeles Chargers.

items.title: Chargers vs Patriots | Wild Card Weekend Highlights
items.summary: Highlights from the Wild Card Weekend matchup between the Los Angeles Chargers and the New England Patriots during the 2025 NFL season.

items.title: Raphinha shines as Bar√ßa get thrilling win over Madrid in Supercopa final
items.summary: Barcelona claim their first trophy of 2026, avenging October's El Cl√°sico loss with Spanish Supercopa win.

items.title: European football: McTominay strikes twice as Napoli rescue point at Inter
items.summary: Scotland midfielder scores two equalisers in 2-2 draw Bayern Munich crush Wolfsburg to go 11 points clear Scott McTominay scored a double as the defending champions Napoli twice came from behind to secure a 2-2 draw with the Serie A leaders Inter at San Siro. Inter came close to gaining revenge for their 3-1 defeat in Naples earlier this season and a win would have opened up a commanding gap at the top, but Napoli‚Äôs never-say-die attitude keeps them very much in the title race. Continue reading...

items.title: Michael Carrick emerges as favourite to be Manchester United interim manager
items.summary: Former midfielder ahead of Solskj√¶r after interviews Darren Fletcher admits he is in the dark over his position Michael Carrick has emerged as the favourite candidate to be Manchester United‚Äôs interim manager for the rest of the season ahead of Ole Gunnar Solskj√¶r after the interview process, with the club‚Äôs executive expected to finalise the decision on Monday. While Omar Berrada, the chief executive, and Jason Wilcox, the director of football, are understood to have not made a formal offer, they are leaning towards Carrick, sources have informed the Guardian. This follows both Carrick and Solskj√¶r having face-to-face discussions with the hierarchy. Berrada and Wilcox met Carrick on Thursday and Solskj√¶r on Saturday at the club‚Äôs Carrington training ground. Continue reading...
